summary:
### Summary of GitHub Activity for BuidlGuidl/abi.ninja - August 2025

- **Major Improvements:**
  - Upgraded Yarn to version 4.9.4.
  - Updated multiple packages, including Next.js and React, to their latest versions, enhancing overall performance and compatibility.

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Closed issue #184, addressing a bug related to rate limiting when loading contracts, which was resolved by enhancing the DisplayVariable component to manage data fetching timing.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on upgrading dependencies to ensure the project remains up-to-date and functional.
  - Addressing performance issues related to API rate limits, improving user experience.

topIssues.title: bug: too many requests when loading a contract
Up node as vercel will not support it beyond sept 1

topPRs.title: Enhance DisplayVariable component to fix 429 from alchemy
